intro: I am currently a M.S. student at the Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering (CSIE), National Cheng Kung University (NCKU), Tainan, Taiwan. I received the B.S. degree from the Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering (CSIE), National Chung Cheng University (CCU), Chiayi, Taiwan, in 2022. My research interests include memory/storage systems and processing-in-memory architectures/applications.
